constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 输入数据构成一棵树，根节点为1，每个节点的直接上级唯一

constraints.name: parent_child_bonus_dependency
constraints.description: 如果一个节点获得奖金，则其直接上级必须至少获得1的奖金

constraints.name: total_bonus_limit
constraints.description: 所有节点的奖金总和不超过给定的上限K

constraints.name: bonus_threshold
constraints.description: 每个节点只有在获得至少ci的奖金时，积极性才会提高pi
